doc:
John Corbett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Corbett 0 John Joseph Corbett (born May 9, 1961) is an American actor and country music singer. He is known for his roles as Chris Stevens on CBS' Northern Exposure and as Aidan Shaw on HBO's Sex and the City. He reprised the latter role for the film sequel Sex and the City 2 (2010). Corbett also portrayed the male lead, Ian Miller, in the romantic comedy film My Big Fat Greek Wedding (2002) and its 2016 sequel. Corbett starred as Max Gregson on Showtime's United States of Tara, recurred as Seth Holt on NBC's Parenthood, and starred as Josiah "Flash" Bacon on FX's Sex Drugs Rock Roll. Aside from acting, Corbett has released two country albums, including his Billboard-charting self-titled debut. John_Joseph_Corbett ( born May_9_,_1961 ) is an_American_actor_and_country_music_singer . He is_known for his_roles as Chris_Stevens on CBS '_Northern_Exposure and as Aidan_Shaw on HBO 's_Sex and the_City . He reprised the_latter_role for the_film_sequel_Sex and the_City_2 ( 2010_) . Corbett also portrayed the_male_lead , Ian_Miller , in the_romantic_comedy_film My_Big_Fat_Greek_Wedding_(_2002_) and its_2016_sequel . Corbett starred as Max_Gregson on Showtime 's_United_States of Tara , recurred as Seth_Holt on NBC 's_Parenthood , and starred as Josiah_"_Flash_"_Bacon on FX 's_Sex_ . Aside from acting , Corbett has_released two_country_albums , including his_Billboard-charting_self-titled_debut .
